biology
  specialized a part of a plant or animal that is like a bag and often contains liquid, or a similar artificially made structure: Bursa are fluid-filled sacs throughout the body whose function is to reduce friction between muscles and tendons as they move over bones. A sac of saline solution is then inserted into the cavity.
